text.autoconfig.emacsinput.title: Emacs Input Settings
text.autoconfig.emacsinput.option.enable: Master switch. When disabled, all Emacs keybindings are off.
text.autoconfig.emacsinput.option.comman: Commands to force enable, bypassing modifier and category settings. Use Emacs notation: C-f, M-b, C-x C-x, etc.
Commands to force disable, even if their category is enabled. Takes precedence over Force Enabled. Use Emacs notation: C-f, M-b, etc.
text.autoconfig.emacsinput.option.keybin: Enable Ctrl+key bindings (C-f, C-b, C-a, C-e, C-k, C-y, etc.).
Enable Alt+key bindings (M-f, M-b, M-d, M-w, M-y, M-t).
C-f, C-b (char), M-f, M-b (word), C-a, C-e (line), C-n, C-p (line/history).
C-k, C-u (line), C-w, M-w (region), C-y, M-y (yank), C-d, M-d, M-Backspace (delete/kill).
C-Space (set mark), C-x C-x (exchange point and mark).
text.autoconfig.emacsinput.option.histor: C-r/C-s for incremental history search in chat.
text.autoconfig.emacsinput.option.option: When no text is selected, C-w kills backward to whitespace. When disabled, C-w only kills the selected region.
How Option key affects character input. Block All: always block special chars. Block When Bound: only block if key has an Emacs binding.
